column4: I seem to be having troubles. I've compiled and installed a kernel (2.6.25-RC2) and it runs fine. But When I try compiling the Nvidia Driver's. It fails because it can't find Linux kernel headers. Anyone have experience in getting the headers installed correctly and/or the nvidia driver? :D
I never had this problem before >.>
why did you up date the kernel?
For some reason, it wasn't seeing both cores of my CPU. The new kernel I compiled myself does though
